option.name: start-line
option.description: Only the content starting from this line will be included.

option.name: end-line
option.description: Only the content starting up to (but excluding) this line will be included.

option.name: start-after
option.description: Only the content after the first occurence of the specified text will be included.

option.name: end-before
option.description: Only the content before the first occurence of the specified text (but after any "after" text) will be included.
